Spells:
Aqueous Orb (Aquatic3 Conj): R300' 10' diameter sphere douses normal fires and acts as Dispel Magic on magical ones, inflicts 2d6 HP nonlethal (DC 16 Ref neg) and engulfs (DC 16 Ref neg), moves 30'/rd and rolls over 10' obstacles for 20 rd
Beast Shape IV (Aquatic6 Tran): Self becomes tiny (+8 Dexterity, -2 Strength, +3 AC) or large (+6 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +6 AC) magical beast for 20 min
Control Water (Aquatic5 Tran): R1200' Raises or lowers 20 10'x10'x2' of water 40' for 200 min
Geyser (Aquatic4 Conj): R1200' 5' sq inflicts 3d6 HP fire and 10d6 falling (DC 17 Ref half fire only), and surrounding 50' radius inflicts 1d6 HP fire, for conc + 1 rd
Hydraulic Push (Aquatic1 Evoc): R75' Target suffers CMB +23 bull rush; extinguishes normal fire up to 5' sq
Seamantle (Aquatic8 Conj): 30' water column hinders fire spells and gives self +8 AC, +4 Reflex, 30' slam attack, and touch that extinguishes fires for 20 min
Slipstream (Aquatic2 Conj): Creates wave that moves touched 10'/rd (20' downhill) and gives +20' Swim for 200 min
Summon Monster VII (Aquatic7 Conj): R75' 1 7th-, 1d3 6th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
World Wave (Aquatic9 Tran): Self rides 20'x10' natural terrain oval that forms 30' wave for 20 rd or 5' swell for 20 hr, moves 240'/rd, and inflicts 6d6 (wave) or 1d6 (swell) HP bludgeoning to non-natural objects (constructs and undead suffer dbl HP)
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Aquatic Telepathy: May cast on aquatic and swimming creatures Suggestion 3/dy and Demand 1/dy
Bloodline Aquatic: +1 Caster Level on water spells/Summoned water and swimming creatures gain +1 attack and damage
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Deep One: Has continuous Freedom Of Movement effects
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Raise The Deep: May raise water as per dbl dimension Control Water even when no water present 1/dy
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
